description: dark blue oval bank with a round photo print of King George VI and Queen Elizabeth flanked by red lions on either side and a red and gold crown above; text on other side; removable lid
inscription:
Inscriptions

scratched over picture: [W I L L A (?)]; on side with picture, in red: [Coronation] and [May 12th 1937]; on opposite side, in blue: long text describing coronation of King George VI and Queen Elizabeth
object_name: "George VI and Queen Elizabeth Coronation Bank" still bank
title: "George VI and Queen Elizabeth Coronation Bank" still bank
